meanings.sent1: The unchilled water felt warm to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The unchilled soda was room temperature.
meanings.sent3: The unchilled ice cream melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her unchilled demeanor made it hard to approach her.
meanings.sent5: The unchilled metal handle burned his hand in the summer heat.

meanings.sent1: The unchilled soup was too hot to eat right away.
meanings.sent2: The unchilled room felt stuffy and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The unchilled coffee scalded his tongue.
meanings.sent4: Her unchilled response left him feeling ignored.
meanings.sent5: The unchilled engine overheated after running for hours.

meanings.sent1: The unchilled wine was not as refreshing as expected.
meanings.sent2: The unchilled air in the room made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent3: The unchilled fruit juice tasted too sweet.
meanings.sent4: Her unchilled attitude made the situation tense.
meanings.sent5: The unchilled river water was surprisingly warm in the summer.
